channel.title: Rajiv-Malhotra-Talks
channel.description:
A podcast created using https://github.com/vedavaapi/scala-akka-http-server from the archive item: https://archive.org/details/Rajiv-Malhotra-Talks, with description: Collected Lectures, Speeches and Talk of Shri. Rajiv Malhotra, an Indian American Intellectual. 

For original source please visit https://rajivmalhotra.com/ 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RajivMalhotra.Official/ 
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCk85J3pqkn1y--k2wNMbthA 

Topics: Rajiv Malhotra, Indian American Identity, Intellectual Kshatriya, Decolonization, Dharmic Cutting Edge, Digestion, Indic Grand Narrative, Kumbha Mela, Purva Paksha, Western Universalism, Being Different, Invading the Sacred, Breaking India, Indras Net, Battle for Sanskrit, Hinduphobia, Indian Think Tank, Indian Intellectual

- Rajiv Malhotra Volunteers.

.
